metadata.title: CVE-2016-5836 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The oEmbed protocol implementation in WordPress before 4.5.3 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5836` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.5.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.5.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyfifteen - 4.5.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyseventeen - 4.5.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentysixteen - 4.5.3+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.3+dfsg-1').
